message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a mutually beneficial deal. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to consider a price of $1100000, which is a compromise between our initial offers. Let's see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $900000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm thinking of $1050000. This is my final offer for now.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer, so I'm thinking of $950000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $950000. I'm starting to think that we're getting close to a deal, but I need to make sure I get the best possible price for the product. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to be at $1000000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, I'm not willing to go any higher than $900000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $900000. I've already made several compromises, and I need to prioritize getting the best possible price for the product. I'm willing to make one last offer of $1050000, but if you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. This is my final offer.
